text:
As a black health care worker, Nikki Guyton details her efforts to encourage hesitant family, friends and co-workers to get a #Covid19 vaccine when available. On a vaccine education week episode of our #ToThePointAlready podcast. #covid19 #vaccine
LISTEN: https://t.co/tQFYN9X0LW https://t.co/NPSvI0kMGG
